label: ham
subject:
Re: [cc-community] Q. about license metadata in <span> element
	and	XHTML validation
body: 38 (return) [ In a homily of Asterius, bishop of Amasia, M. de Valois has discovered (ad Ammian. xiv. 6) that this was a new fashion; that bears, wolves lions, and tigers, woods, hunting-matches, &c., were represented in embroidery: and that the more pious coxcombs substituted the figure or legend of some favorite saint.]
